mapper.sql: id, name, address, code, icon, icon as iconCls, pid, seq, create_time AS createTime
mapper.select: SELECT so.id, so.`name`, so.address, so.code, so.icon, so.icon as iconCls, so.pid, so.seq, so.create_time AS createTime FROM sys_organization so LEFT JOIN sys_organization so2 ON so.pid = so2.id ORDER BY so.seq
